name: Wild times (teaser)
description: sOr & Nicolás Dardano presenting Wild Times, an audiovisual performance. This serie is inspired by our fascination for natural light, shapes and materials.It proposes a contemplative pseudorealistic journey through Murcia’s rural landscapes (Spain), to slowly move towards introspective imaginary compositions.The setup mixes different technics to sync live video and sound.(HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED)& (ORIGINAL FILES)https://gateway.pinata.cloud/ipfs/QmfBv6RobXorY7r69aEdCNRhrESC1VtPdB46Z1q1Q353s6
